oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Inexact Newton's method to nonlinear functions with values in a cone
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ferreira, O. P.
Silva, G. N.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Numerical Analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The problem of finding a solution of nonlinear inclusion problems in Banach space is considered in this paper. Using convex optimization techniques introduced by Robinson (Numer. Math., Vol. 19, 1972, pp. 341-347), a robust convergence theorem for inexact Newton's method is proved. As an application, an affine invariant version of Kantorovich's theorem and Smale's \alpha-theorem for inexact Newton's method is obtained.
Comment: 15 pages, 0 figure. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:1403.2462
